question: Which testing dataset in the paper has the largest size(determined by counts of instances)?I want to read its source paper, can you give me the title?
answer_format: Your answer should be a list of two strings, the first element is the name of the testing dataset, and the second element is the title of the source paper.
reasoning_steps: First, locate the table about the testing datasets.
Second, determine the dataset with the most counts of instances and find some information about its source paper(often the author).
Finally, turn to reference section to find the title of the source paper.

gold: The genia corpus: An annotated research abstract corpus in molecular biology domain
